features.title: An Arma 3 server
features.p1: Armory des buissons is a training server for the game Arma 3. It offers many features such as anked PVP, public and private arenas, sandbox and attack-defense fight.
features.p2: Go ahead and join us now to become the best player !

tpintofight.title: Be teleported directly into the fight
tpintofight.afterKey: ) allows you to teleport directly to different combat zones. You can also activate automatic teleportation during respawn. The game panel also tells you the number of players in each area.

chooseYourGameplay.title: Choose your gameplay
chooseYourGameplay.subTitle: Different types of figting zone are available
chooseYourGameplay.striderParagraph: You can train in long distance combat thanks to the large arenas with an open field.
chooseYourGameplay.soldierParagraph: You can train in short distance combat thanks to the small arenas like towns or factory.

card1.title: Invite your friends
card1.sub: Invite your friends and split up into two teams.

card2.title: Set the points limit
card2.sub: Define the number of kills to reach to win the game.

card3.title: Choose your arena
card3.sub: A variety of short or long distance arenas are available.

ranking.title: Get the highest ranking
ranking.paragraph: Each player's ranking is instantly updated each time he kills or is killed by another player. Players are split in 6 divisions according to their number of points.

quests.title: Complete quests and progress through levels

quest.title: Complete different type of quest
quest.text: Many quests are available. They can be completed daily, seasonally, or just once. Once completed, quests allow you to earn experience points.

levels.title: Progress through levels
levels.text: The experience points earned accumulate to gain levels. Levels allow you to stand out and access unique rewards.

ac.title: Earn virtual credits
ac.text: Each level completed earns you Armory Coins. These virtual credits allow you to purchase unique skins or unlock the VIP over a period of time.

p1.title: A public lobby system
p1.sub: It allows you to sign up for the fight and choose your side.

p2.title: Defenders must defend the bomb
p2.sub: Their goal is to prevent attackers from defusing it.

p3.title: Multiple arenas are available
p3.sub: Arenas are varied and offer a different experience.

p4.title: Attackers must defuse the bomb
p4.sub: Their goal is to prevent the bomb from exploding and therefore defuse it.

p1.title: Sandbox
p1.sub: Sandbox allows you to try out all the vehicles available on the game. Train yourself to fly helicopters and fight against your friends in epic battles.

p2.title: Inventory
p2.sub: You can completely customize your stuff. Outfit, weapons, accessory ... Create the stuff that suits you and fight with it.

p3.title: Gameplay
p3.sub: The server is perfectly programmed to offer you the best gameplay, whether you are alone or with others.

rules.title: Know the rules
rules.p1: Even if we play for fun, it is necessary to respect certain rules in order to guarantee a pleasant gaming experience.

carkill.title: Carkill
carkill.text: Carkill is not allowed, however if it happens, let the person reposition himself.

boost.title: Boost
boost.text: It is forbidden to be killed in order to increase the score of another player.

glitch.title: Glitch
glitch.text: It is obviously forbidden to take advantage of any game bug.

fairplay.title: Fairplay
fairplay.text: Never forget that you are playing for fun, so try to stay fairplay at all times.

rules.p2: In the event of non-compliance with the regulations, sanctions will be taken, going from a simple warning to final banishment

hector.title: Game developer
hector.text: He fully developed the mission and takes care of the administration of the server.

jpat.title: Web developer
jpat.text: He developed the website and moderates the server.

jezah.title: Investor
jezah.text: He initially funded the server and helps with its moderation.

join.title: Join our community
join.p1: You have a problem ? You want to be aware of the last news ? You want to discuss with your friends and with all the members of the Armory ?
join.p2: So our discord is made for you !

contact.title: Contact the founders
contact.p1: You want to join the moderation team? You have a problem with a moderator? You have a suggestion or any other problems ?

rank.title: Understand the ranking system
rank.p1: Each player's ranking is instantly updated each time he kills or is killed by another player. Players are split in 6 divisions according to their number of points.

league.bronze: This division includes the other players.
league.silver: This division brings together the 60% best players.
league.gold: This division brings together the 28% best players.
league.platinium: This division brings together the 8% best players.
league.diamond: This division brings together the 4% best players.
league.top10: This division brings together the 10 best players.

calculation.title: Calculation of the number of points
calculation.p1: The number of points won and lost depends on the ranking of the two players according to the following algorithm:

decrease.title: Decrease for inactivity
decrease.p1: The ranking decreases automatically if the player has not made a kill during the day. This reduction is made according to the division:

distance.title: Reduction for distant kills
distance.p1: Kills made over 50 meters earn less points proportionally to the distance according to the following algorithm:

reset.title: Rank initialization and reset
reset.p1: Rank is initialised at 1000, which corresponds to the Gold division. Rank is reset to 1000 each month. The highest ranked player wins a VIP and a Top 1 skin.
reset.p2: It is also possible to reset your ranking to 1000 by being VIP and going to tour profile.

filter.title: Selection of players
filter.p1: In order to make the ranking as accurate as possible, only players who logged in less than two weeks ago are taken into account in the calculation of the ranking.

vip.title: Help us finance the server
vip.p1: To guarantee you the most pleasant gaming experience, we have invested in a high-performance server. But it comes at a cost, and we need you to help us finance the server.
vip.subTitle: Become a VIP
vip.p2: In return for your donation, you will unlock exceptional visuals for your vehicles and outfits. You will also have access to reserved slots so that you can always connect.

shortcuts.shifth: Put the weapon in the back
shortcuts.ctrlh: Take the weapon in the back
shortcuts.f6: Create a target at the shooting range
